4 do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area*p55235a0428* (b) the stages of mitosis can be seen by preparing a root tip squash.  the list below gives some of the steps involved in preparing a root tip squash.  the steps are not listed in the correct order.  1. heat the root tip in acid  2. warm gently to intensify the stain  3. press down gently on the cells  4. cover with a glass coverslip  5. add the stain to the root tip  6. tease the cells apart  (i) put a cross  in the box next to the letter that shows the correct order for these steps.(1)   a 1, 5, 6, 4, 3, 2   b 1, 6, 3, 4, 5, 2   c 5, 2, 6, 1, 4, 3   d 6, 1, 5, 4, 3, 2  (ii) name a stain that could be used in this method.(1)(total for question 1 = 6 marks)
